reviews.text:
Myself sonam and I have an account in your bank (branch - uco bank haripur kalan dehradun district)
From past 2 weeks I am continuing trying to contact you guys regarding very serious matter with my account and I didn't hear back anything from my branch
Your contact number are wrong and there is no way to contact you guys this was very disappointed
Is this is your way to handle your Constomers??
I am out of town and it's urgent to contact you but how please provide me your working number or take action for this matter

Its a small branch with just 3 employee at most that's what make the work process slow many time when there are 4 to 5 customer in line they don't even have an money counting machine so they hand count money 1-2 times that is not effective and takes a lots of time. But overall its good for a village where customer are less and mostly the account type are current rather than savings.

Worst services,non-coprative staff,Any of staff members has no solutions of any problem,most of the staff either absent or mooving outside bank stick with their mobiles,behavior is also very bad,A fourth class employee governs this branch who is very rude to customer,Nearby locals has bad experience, I think no one in bank is here for business or public interest,they are just passing time
Can higher authorities tell, why is this bank and employees here, can any authority check out-put of this branch.? Can any officer of UCO bank enquire about this crises..?
Change your mobile number from site
Best service provided by the staf.
